General.Name: Vital Energy Inc.
General.Description: Vital Energy, Inc., an independent energy company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of oil and natural gas properties in the Permian Basin of West Texas, United States. The company was formerly known as Laredo Petroleum, Inc. and changed its name to Vital Energy, Inc. in January 2023. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
General.Address: 521 East 2nd Street, Tulsa, OK, United States, 74120

9.Name: Mr. Kyle  Coldiron
9.Title: Vice President of Subsurface & Business Development
